bibl.title: New Light on P. Strasb. Gr. 1406-1409: An Early Witness of Secundus' Sentences.
Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.note: P. Stras. Inv. W.G. 1406-1409 (= M.-P.3 1909; LDAB 3749). - 1. The papyri. - 2. Palaeography. - 3. Identification of the text. - 4. Secundus the silent philosopher: Life and Sentences. - 5. The new witness. - Pp. 272-277: An interim text. Two case-studies.
bibl.seg: Giuseppe Ucciardello, New Light on P. Strasb. Gr. 1406-1409: An Early Witness of Secundus' Sentences.

Tomasz Derda, Adam Łajtar & Jakub Urbanik (edd.), in cooperation with Andrzej Mirończuk & Tomasz Ochała, Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology, Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013. Volume I. Literary Papyri: Texts and Studies = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVIII (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 251-277, 2 figg.
